name: decentralized-booking-system
description: A blockchain-powered booking system for hackathon

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../contracts && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run blockchain" "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.deploy:local: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy:testnet: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network goerli
